Skill_Description: Ability to express ideas clearly in speech.
Ability to express ideas clearly in writing.
Ability to meet deadlines for assessments and tasks.
Overall planning and management of projects.
Gathering and analysing information for projects.
Developing innovative ideas through digital transformation.
Analysing market trends and industry data.
Collaborating to integrate sustainability into business operations.
Conducting regular assessments of sustainability performance.
Staying informed about emerging trends and regulations.
Engaging with internal and external stakeholders.
Overseeing project management for strategic initiatives.
Training AI models related to clinical medicine, linguistics, technical terminology.
Evaluating and ranking responses generated by AI systems.
Assessing factuality of text produced by AI models.
Assessing relevance of text produced by AI models.
Development and implementation of new clinical services.
Coordinating with key stakeholders to provide customer support.
Creating strategic partnerships with hospitals, laboratories, and other institutions.
Keeping updated on relevant changes of compliance.
Reviewing medical authorisations, claims and denials.
Maintaining billing accounts via billing software.
Planning publications to disseminate research findings.
Inspiring students to explore AI-related careers.
Aligning teaching with cultural and educational contexts.
General proficiency in Microsoft Office applications.
Proficiency in email and internet usage.
